text: The 1973 Volta a Catalunya was the 53rd edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 12 September to 19 September 1973. The race started in Amposta and finished in Lleida. The race was won by Domingo Perurena. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 10" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 19" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 44" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 18" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 19" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 19" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 58" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 05" |} |} ==References== 1973 Volta Category:1973 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1973 sports events in Europe
